Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_SEC_GROUP_HIER_INS_ID_SP" ( P_GROUP_ID IN NUMBER, P_PARENT_GROUP_ID IN NUMBER, P_CREATED_BY IN NUMBER DEFAULT 1, P_ID OUT NUMBER ) IS BEGIN SELECT CMN_SEC_GROUP_HIERARCHIES_S1.NEXTVAL INTO P_ID FROM DUAL; INSERT INTO CMN_SEC_GROUP_HIERARCHIES ( ID, GROUP_ID, PARENT_GROUP_ID, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY ) VALUES ( P_ID, P_GROUP_ID, P_PARENT_GROUP_ID, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY ); END;
